'''Faith Lucy Tilly Faulconbridge''' ([[1928]]- [[24 October]], [[2017]])<ref>http://www.legacy.com/obituaries/thetimes-uk/obituary.aspx?pid=187107377</ref><ref>http://tolkienbrasil.com/noticias/diversas/faleceu-faith-tolkien-primeira-esposa-de-christopher-tolkien/</ref> was the first wife of [[Christopher Tolkien]]. They married on [[2 April|April 2]], [[1951]] and separated in [[1964]]; the divorce followed three years later. She was a sculptress, and made the [[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien's bust at Exeter.jpg|bust]] of Tolkien that the English Faculty at Oxford presented to him at his retirement.<ref>[[Douglas A. Anderson]], "Tolkien, Faith", published in ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien Encyclopedia]]'' (edited by [[Michael D.C. Drout]]), pp. 665-6</ref>
